audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Developers

name: Magento Full Page Cache

screenshots.caption: With this extension, you can simply make your Magento e-store up to 30 times faster.
2. Full Page Cache Extension also helps you to reduce server response time.
3. Easily configure information in the backend.

short_description:
Do you know that a fast site can place your site higher in search engines and directly increase profits? Five best ecommerce companies including Amazon, Esty, Alibaba, Asos, ebay stated that every 100ms of latency costs them nearly 2% in profit. Why you don’t make your site faster? Cmsideas has released Magento Full Page Cache that helps  your site run at its fastest.

Details here: http://cmsideas.net/magento-full-page-cache.html

Wonderful opportunity:

- You can get Full Page Cache together with four other extensions at a very special price with Magento Ecommerce Package 01 $235 worth of files for ONLY $99

- Another package included this extension for your choice is Magento Ecommerce Package 02 – the $215 worth of files for ONLY $119 with three other extensions and one Magento theme.
summary: Magento Full Page Cache - Magento Extension - Cmsideas
